questions.q: Is the voice cloning truly realistic?
questions.a: Yes. We use state-of-the-art technology that analyzes intonation, rhythm, and timbre from just a few minutes of recording. The result is a natural and warm voice, designed to capture the essence of the person, not for deception.

questions.q: How does the 'multisig' vault security work?
questions.a: Your vault is protected by a 'secret sharing' system. Instead of a single key, access is split into several fragments distributed to your guardians. A set number of guardians must collaborate to reassemble the key. No one, not even SoulBox, can access it alone.

questions.q: How does SoulBox verify a death before releasing messages?
questions.a: The process is initiated by a designated beneficiary. Then, the guardians you've chosen must independently confirm the situation. We can also integrate verification via official documents to ensure no premature release occurs.

questions.q: What happens to my data after I pass away?
questions.a: You remain the owner of your data. In your directives, you can appoint a 'digital executor' to oversee your legacy. The clone and its contents are frozen and can no longer be modified, ensuring your wishes are respected to the letter.

questions.q: Can I use SoulBox while I'm alive, for instance, if I lose the ability to speak?
questions.a: Absolutely. SoulBox can serve as an assistive communication tool. If a person loses their ability to speak, their voice clone can allow them to continue communicating with loved ones, providing a familiar and comforting presence in difficult times.

product.title: Your Legacy, Reimagined
product.subtitle: SoulBox is more than an archive. It's a living presence, a vault for the future, and a bridge between generations.

features.title: The Voice Clone: A Familiar and Eternal Voice
features.body: Our advanced technology recreates the warmth, tone, and unique nuances of a loved one's voice. It's not just text-to-speech, but an authentic presence that can share memories, tell stories, or simply offer words of comfort, preserving the essence of the person forever.

features.title: The Digital Vault: Your Treasures Sealed for the Future
features.body: Deposit messages, videos, important documents, or life advice into an inviolable space. Thanks to our multisig security system, only your trusted guardians, acting in concert, can unlock these memories, strictly adhering to the conditions you have set.

features.title: Sharing Channels: Your Legacy, Shared on Your Terms
features.body: You remain in complete control. Precisely define who can interact with your clone, who can access your vault, and under what circumstances. SoulBox allows you to build a custom digital legacy with complete confidence and serenity.
